verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt love <WH157> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8804> his charge <WH4931>, and his statutes <WH2708>, and his judgments <WH4941>, and his Mitzvot <WH4687>, alway <WH3117>.

And know <WH3045> <WH8804> ye this day <WH3117>: for I speak not with your children <WH1121> which have not known <WH3045> <WH8804>, and which have not seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the chastisement <WH4148> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, his greatness <WH1433>, his mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and his stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803> arm <WH2220>,

And his miracles <WH226>, and his acts <WH4639>, which he did <WH6213> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Pharaoh <WH6547> the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and unto all his land <WH776>;

And what he did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto the army <WH2428> of Egypt <WH4714>, unto their horses <WH5483>, and to their chariots <WH7393>; how he made the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> to overflow <WH6687> <WH8689> them <WH6440> as they pursued <WH7291> <WH8800> after <WH310> you, and how the YY <WH3068> hath destroyed <WH6> <WH8762> them unto this day <WH3117>;
And what he did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto you in the wilderness <WH4057>, until ye came <WH935> <WH8800> into this place <WH4725>;

And what he did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>, the son <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205>: how the earth <WH776> opened <WH6475> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310>, and swallowed them up <WH1104> <WH8799>, and their households <WH1004>, and their tents <WH168>, and all the substance <WH3351> that was in their possession <WH7272>, in the midst <WH7130> of all Yisra'EL <WH3478>:
But your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> <WH8802> all the great <WH1419> acts <WH4639> of the YY <WH3068> which he did <WH6213> <WH8804>.

Therefore shall ye keep <WH8104> <WH8804> all the Mitzvot <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> <WH8764> you this day <WH3117>, that ye may be strong <WH2388> <WH8799>, and go in <WH935> <WH8804> and possess <WH3423> <WH8804> the land <WH776>, whither ye go <WH5674> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it;

And that ye may prolong <WH748> <WH8686> your days <WH3117> in the land <WH127>, which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> unto them and to their seed <WH2233>, a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

For the land <WH776>, whither thou goest in <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it, is not as the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from whence ye came out <WH3318> <WH8804>, where thou sowedst <WH2232> <WH8799> thy seed <WH2233>, and wateredst <WH8248> <WH8689> it with thy foot <WH7272>, as a garden <WH1588> of herbs <WH3419>:

But the land <WH776>, whither ye go <WH5674> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it, is a land <WH776> of hills <WH2022> and valleys <WH1237>, and drinketh <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325> of the rain <WH4306> of heaven <WH8064>:

A land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> careth for <WH1875> <WH8802>: the eyes <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> are always <WH8548> upon it, from the beginning <WH7225> of the year <WH8141> even unto the end <WH319> of the year <WH8141>.

And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> diligently <WH8085> <WH8800> unto my Mitzvot <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> you this day <WH3117>, to love <WH157> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> him with all your heart <WH3824> and with all your soul <WH5315>,

That I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> you the rain <WH4306> of your land <WH776> in his due season <WH6256>, the first rain <WH3138> and the latter rain <WH4456>, that thou mayest gather <WH622> <WH8804> in thy corn <WH1715>, and thy wine <WH8492>, and thine oil <WH3323>.
And I will send <WH5414> <WH8804> grass <WH6212> in thy fields <WH7704> for thy cattle <WH929>, that thou mayest eat <WH398> <WH8804> and be full <WH7646> <WH8804>.

Take heed <WH8104> <WH8734> to yourselves, that your heart <WH3824> be not deceived <WH6601> <WH8799>, and ye turn aside <WH5493> <WH8804>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8804> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> <WH8694> them;

And then the YY'S <WH3068> wrath <WH639> be kindled <WH2734> <WH8804> against you, and he shut up <WH6113> <WH8804> the heaven <WH8064>, that there be no rain <WH4306>, and that the land <WH127> yield <WH5414> <WH8799> not her fruit <WH2981>; and lest ye perish <WH6> <WH8804> quickly <WH4120> from off the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> you.

Therefore shall ye lay up <WH7760> <WH8804> these my words <WH1697> in your heart <WH3824> and in your soul <WH5315>, and bind <WH7194> <WH8804> them for a sign <WH226> upon your hand <WH3027>, that they may be as frontlets <WH2903> between your eyes <WH5869>.

And ye shall teach <WH3925> <WH8765> them your children <WH1121>, speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> of them when thou sittest <WH3427> <WH8800> in thine house <WH1004>, and when thou walkest <WH3212> <WH8800> by the way <WH1870>, when thou liest <WH7901> <WH8800> down, and when thou risest up <WH6965> <WH8800>.
And thou shalt write <WH3789> <WH8804> them upon the door posts <WH4201> of thine house <WH1004>, and upon thy gates <WH8179>:

That your days <WH3117> may be multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799>, and the days <WH3117> of your children <WH1121>, in the land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them, as the days <WH3117> of heaven <WH8064> upon the earth <WH776>.

For if ye shall diligently <WH8104> <WH8800> keep <WH8104> <WH8799> all these Mitzvot <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> you, to do <WH6213> <WH8800> them, to love <WH157> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in all his ways <WH1870>, and to cleave <WH1692> <WH8800> unto him;

Then will the YY <WH3068> drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> all these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you, and ye shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> greater <WH1419> nations <WH1471> and mightier <WH6099> than yourselves.

Havahry place <WH4725> whereon the soles <WH3709> of your feet <WH7272> shall tread <WH1869> <WH8799> shall be yours: from the wilderness <WH4057> and Lebanon <WH3844>, from the river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>, even unto the uttermost <WH314> sea <WH3220> shall your coast <WH1366> be.

There shall no man <WH376> be able to stand <WH3320> <WH8691> before <WH6440> you: for the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> shall lay <WH5414> <WH8799> the fear <WH6343> of you and the dread <WH4172> of you upon <WH6440> all the land <WH776> that ye shall tread <WH1869> <WH8799> upon, as he hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto you.
Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, I set <WH5414> <WH8802> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117> a b'rakhah <WH1293> and a curse <WH7045>;
A b'rakhah <WH1293>, if ye obey <WH8085> <WH8799> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> you this day <WH3117>:

And a curse <WH7045>, if ye will not obey <WH8085> <WH8799> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, but turn aside <WH5493> <WH8804> out of the way <WH1870> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> you this day <WH3117>, to go <WH3212> <WH8800> after <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, which ye have not known <WH3045> <WH8804>.

And it shall come to pass, when the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath brought thee in <WH935> <WH8686> unto the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it, that thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> the b'rakhah <WH1293> upon mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630>, and the curse <WH7045> upon mount <WH2022> Ebal <WH5858>.

Are they not on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, by <WH310> the way <WH1870> where the sun <WH8121> goeth down <WH3996>, in the land <WH776> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, which dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the champaign <WH6160> over against <WH4136> Gilgal <WH1537>, beside <WH681> the plains <WH436> of Moreh <WH4176> ?

For ye shall pass over <WH5674> <WH8802> Yarden <WH3383> to go in <WH935> <WH8800> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> you, and ye shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> it, and dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> therein.
And ye shall observe <WH8104> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all the statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941> which I set <WH5414> <WH8802> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117>.
